name: EasyAsPy
body:
Welcome to the official website for EasyAsPy. EasyAsPy is a Python framework that allows the use of Scratch-like commands. 

For more information, please visit our forum topic on Scratch.  [http://scratch.mit.edu/forums/viewtopic.php?id=110623](http://scratch.mit.edu/forums/viewtopic.php?id=110623)
